full_description:
FUJIFILM XF 35mm f/2 R WR Camera Lens

The FUJIFILM XF 35mm f/2 R WR Camera Lens is ideal for any scene and application. This is the new standard for all photography fans. This Lens offers a focal length equivalent to 53mm with the angle of view similar to that of the human eye. It delivers sharp images with rich bokeh experience. The lens uses eight seals on the barrel to protect it from rain, dust and splashes of water when shooting outdoors. The exterior of the lens is extremely resistant against unfavorable weather conditions.

Sharper picture quality

FUJIFILM XF 35mm Camera Lens has optical construction of 9 elements in 6 groups (including two aspherical elements) delivers sharp, rich image quality even at the widest aperture of F2.0. Lens mechanism blends the perfect balance of high image quality and compact size.

Fastest autofocus shots

XF 35mm R WR Camera Lens features the smallest diameter of the line-up thanks to the inner focus system, it achieves an autofocus time of just 0.08 sec. The focus system moves the small and lightweight lens elements that is combined with a stepping motor to produce quiet, accurate and fast autofocus – a must for all snap shooters that need to capture a spontaneous moment.

Compact with futuristic profile

Two aspherical lenses are used to ensure a small and compact output. Only 45.9mm in length with a diameter of 60mm, the slim stylish design allows comfortable operation and draws minimum attention to the photographer, making it the perfect lens for portrait, street or reportage photography.

All metal exterior & useful functionalities

The XF 35mm f/2 R WR Camera Lens exterior uses all metal parts to ensure it is durable enough for a wide variety of shooting situations. The fine texture of the metal parts further enhance the shooting experience and ensure it can be operated easily and accurately with wet or gloved hands. The lens features a weather and dust-resistant structure with eight seals on the lens barrel keeping the lens protected from rain, dust and splashes of water when shooting outdoors. It can also work in temperatures as low as -10°C.

Various types of lens hood

This FUJIFILM XF 35mm Lens hoods block unnecessary light from entering the lens to maintain the maximum optical performance. There are two types of lens hood available for the FUJIFILM XF 35mm f/2 R WR Camera Lens. A lightweight and compact circular lens hood is included with it and a classical and stylish metal hood LH-XF35-2 is available for purchase as an optional accessory. Both lens hoods allows the front lens cap to be used while attached.

title: FUJIFILM XF 16-55mm f2.8 R LM WR Camera Lens
cat_seo_title: FUJIFILM Camera Lens Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy FUJIFILM Camera Lens at the best price in Bangladesh. Latest FUJIFILM Camera Lens available at Star Tech Shop. Order online to get delivery anywhere in BD.
full_description:
FUJIFILM XF 16-55mm f2.8 R LM WR Camera Lens

The FUJIFILM XF 16-55mm f2.8 R LM WR Camera Lens is a fast, standard zoom providing a constant F2.8 aperture throughout. That means it’s not only useful across a broad range of subjects, but it can also be used in all sorts of challenging lighting conditions. Normally a zoom lens places greater emphasis on convenience at the sacrifice of quality. This lens however has been designed with no compromise, so the image quality is comparable to that of a prime lens. This lens is built to offer the versatility of a zoom lens with the ultimate image quality altogether.

Multiple features with great functionality

This XF 16-55mm f2.8 R LM WR Camera Lens manages to strike the perfect balance of sharpness with smooth bokeh. It delivers true to life colors that is never seen before in a zoom lens. The zoom uses leading-edge optical technology and lens coatings that draws on Fujifilm’s esteemed heritage in optical design. Fujifilm's proprietary (High Transmittance Electron Beam Coating) is used to eliminate reflections and Nano GI coating is applied to control ghosting and flare caused by light bouncing around inside the lens. In doing so, this cutting-edge technology improves the quality of light hitting the sensor, which increases overall image quality. The XF 16-55mm R LM WR Camera Lens also uses a rounded, nine-bladed aperture design to provide smooth and circular bokeh for outstanding subject separation.

Less Boundaries

FUJIFILM XF 16-55mm f2.8 R LM WR Camera Lens has these features mean this lens delivers the perfect balance of edge-to-edge sharpness, exceptional background blur, and true-to-life color in every part of its zoom range. A professional, large aperture zoom lens must produce stunning images and the XF 16-55mm R LM WR Camera Lens uses nine-blade diaphragm to help minimize spherical aberrations. It has a basic construction with three aspherical elements to reduce distortions and spherical aberrations, while three extra-low dispersion elements are also used to control chromatic aberrations and increase clarity.

Cover every angle

Normally, you would need to carry four XF prime lenses to replicate the focal range of this zoom lens. However with the FUJIFILM XF 16-55mm f2.8 R LM WR Camera Lens, you get every mm in between 16mm and 55mm to fine tune your composition even more. This convenience while maintaining amazing image quality gives you an extra advantage versus carrying four fixed focal length lenses. A standard zoom like the FUJIFILM XF 16-55mm R LM WR Camera Lens lets you cover without changing lenses. From wide angle to short telephoto, this is a small lens with huge scope. At 16mm, you can record every detail in big landscape scenes, towering architecture, or cramped interiors. Zoom in to 24mm or 35mm and you've got a perfect lens for groups, street, or documentary photos. And up around 50mm, you’re perfectly placed for portraits and close-ups.

Smooth day-to-day comforting usage

All of the XF 16-55mm R LM WR Camera Lens’s versatility and image quality would be for nothing without great AF performance to back it up. This lens uses a high-speed linear motor that can focus as fast as 0.02 seconds, so it will react to the moment just as fast as you do. Combine the fast AF with Fujifilm’s Face/Eye Detection AF technology for perfect portraits, or use it in Zone or Tracking mode on action subjects. This lens reacts as quick as you do when those precious moments occur.

Prepared for any environments

Any professional standard zoom needs to be ready for adverse environments – and the FUJIFILM XF 16-55mm f2.8 R LM WR Camera Lens won’t disappoint anyone ever. It has optimal dust and weather resistant construction, letting you keep your eye on creating great images, whatever the climate or weather conditions.

The FUJIFILM XF 56mm f/1.2 R WR Camera Lens is a portrait-optimized prime lens with an 85mm-equivalent focal length highlighted by its exceptionally quick f/1.2 maximum aperture for isolating subjects and working in low light. Aspherical and extra-low dispersion elements are used in the optical design to assist eliminate a range of aberrations, color fringing, and distortion and provide high sharpness and clarity. Moreover, a Super EBC coating is employed in FUJIFILM XF 56mm f/1.2 R WR Camera Lens to lessen flare and ghosting for enhanced contrast and color accuracy under bright, backlit conditions. Together with a rounded seven-blade diaphragm to create a nice bokeh effect, this FUJIFILM XF 56mm f/1.2 R WR Camera Lens also includes an internal focusing mechanism for speedy focusing performance.

FUJIFILM XF 10-24mm f/4 R OIS WR Lens

The FUJIFILM XF 10-24mm f/4 R OIS WR is a flexible wide-angle zoom lens with an updated physical design that offers more user-friendly handling and strong weather sealing. The constant f/4 maximum aperture and sophisticated optics of this 15-36mm equivalent zoom are its defining features. These optics correct both chromatic and spherical aberrations for high color accuracy, sharpness, and precise rendering by employing a number of extra-low dispersion and aspherical elements. When working in bright illumination, a Super EBC coating also reduces flare and ghosting for better contrast and color neutrality. A stepping motor provides fast and silent focusing performance, and an upgraded optical image stabilization technology reduces the appearance of camera shake by 3.5 stops for better sharpness when shooting handheld.

Best of Wide-Angle View

The XF 10-24mm F/4 R OIS WR is a small, wide-angle zoom lens that covers the entire range of traditional 35mm wide-angle focal lengths in a single lens. Its 35mm equivalent focal range is 15–36mm. Whichever lens you go with, this one will undoubtedly help you discover the true delight and enjoyment of wide-angle photography.

More Freedom to Create

Discover new locations and don't hesitate to leave your tripod behind as you continue to create from unusual perspectives and frame captivating compositions long after the sun sets. A new and advanced gyro sensor enhances the XF 10-24mm F/4 R OIS WR's stability by one stop over its previous version of Optical Image Stabilization (OIS). With this, vibration reduction performance is increased to 3.5 stops, and when combined with an existing X Series camera that has in-body image stabilization (IBIS), such as the FUJIFILM X-T4, it can be further increased to 6.5 stops. One thing is for sure: stable, handheld photographs are coming, regardless of the camera used.

Constant Evolution to Expand Possibilities

In addition to weather resistance, which essentially shields the XF 10-24mm F/4 R OIS WR from dust and moisture, the most recent version of this lens has a number of other enhancements. For instance, the aperture ring now features an A-position lock to prevent unintentional adjustments to the lens's aperture settings. In order to enable aperture settings to be examined without the use of on-screen displays, a new aperture scale has also been added to the aperture ring. Lastly, the lens weighs 25g (0.9 oz) less overall than its predecessor thanks to a 1mm reduction in the breadth of the focus and aperture rings.
